mapper.html:
Dear {{5.`Full Name`}},

Thank you for booking another appointment with MediCare. We are pleased to confirm your appointment details as follows:

Appointment Details:

  • Date: {{16.`Appointment Date`}}
  • Time: {{16.`Appointment Time`}}
  • Specialist To See: {{16.Specialist}}

Since this is your first time with us, please bring the following documents to your appointment:

  1. A valid ID
  2. Any previous medical records

If you have any questions or need to reschedule, please contact us at +25471234567 or medicare@mail.com. We look forward to seeing you.

Best regards,

MediCare
mapper.subject: Your Appointment Confirmation with MediCare
